title: Elegant Diamond Mangalsutra - A Modern Twist on Tradition
materials: Crafted in 18K Rose Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features high-quality black onyx beads and brilliant-cut diamonds with SI clarity.
features: Delicate diamond-studded droplet pendants suspended along a string of traditional black onyx beads. The pendants feature a contemporary floral motif, adding a touch of modern elegance. The intricate setting enhances the brilliance of each diamond.
colors: Rose gold with a warm blush hue
contrasted by the deep black onyx beads and sparkling white diamonds.
occasions: and can even be styled for smaller family functions. A sophisticated choice for the modern Telugu bride.
description: This mangalsutra seamlessly blends traditional symbolism with modern design. The exquisite rose gold finish and dazzling diamonds offer a luxurious feel, while the onyx beads retain the sacred and protective significance of a mangalsutra. Its lightweight design ensures comfortable everyday wear. A symbol of enduring love and style.
